intro: The v-menu component shows a menu at the position of the element used to activate it.

absoluteWithout.heading: Absolute without activator
absoluteWithout.intro: Menus can also be used without an activator by using absolute together with the props position-x and position-y. Try right-clicking anywhere on the image.

close.heading: Close on click
close.intro: Menu can be closed when lost focus.

popover.heading: Popover menu
popover.intro: A menu can be configured to be static when opened, allowing it to function as a popover. This can be useful when there are multiple interactive items within the menu contents.

usein.heading: Use In components
usein.intro: Menus can be placed within almost any component.
